Detect Communities Across Pseudotime Bins

Source: R/detect_communities_across_bins.R
detect_communities_across_bins.Rd

Detects communities in each pseudotime bin using percolation, Leiden clustering, and neighborhood overlap expansion.

Usage

detect_communities_across_bins(
  pt_results,
  min_size = 10,
  n_iterations = 100,
  edge_fraction = 0.6,
  freq_threshold = 0.5,
  percentile = 0.95,
  resolution_parameter = 0.6,
  overlap_threshold = 0.05,
  seed = 123,
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

pt_results

A named list of per-bin results from compute_pseudotime_mi_network. Each element may be an igraph object OR a list containing $graph (igraph).

min_size

Integer, minimum size of communities to retain (default: 10).

n_iterations

Integer, number of percolation iterations (default: 100).

edge_fraction

Numeric, fraction of edges to keep in percolation (default: 0.6).

freq_threshold

Numeric, frequency threshold for consensus edges (default: 0.5).

percentile

Numeric, percentile for edge thresholding (default: 0.95).

resolution_parameter

Numeric, resolution parameter for Leiden clustering (default: 0.6).

overlap_threshold

Numeric, threshold for neighborhood overlap expansion (default: 0.05).

seed

Integer RNG seed base (default: 123). Applied per bin as seed + bin_index.

verbose

Logical, print progress messages (default: FALSE).

Value

A named list with one entry per bin: consensus_graph, communities, sizes.
